name: Pro Gymnast
description:
Exciting Acrobatic Action!


** GAME CONTROLLER STRONGLY RECOMMENDED FOR BEST EXPERIENCE **

Feel the thrill and triumph of accomplishment that only overcoming real challenge can provide in this physics-based acrobatics simulation.

Learn to master the unique controls that allow unlimited expressive freedom, a million ways to fail (and succeed), and produce amazingly lifelike motion.

Key Features

  • Many challenging courses to master, earn medals for completing, score targets, time targets, and finding the special "chalk block" item.
  • Earned medals unlock new sets of levels.
  • Fully featured level editor
  • Avatar customization
  • Built-in replay feature to easily export videos of your in-game exploits

CONTROLLER STRONGLY RECOMMENDED

This game was designed with a game controller (with 2 analog sticks and triggers) in mind. Keyboard controls are available, but are not recommended.
